autoAdvance.title: Auto-Advance Phases
autoAdvance.description: When enabled, the system will automatically advance to the next phase when all matches in the current phase are completed.
autoAdvance.enabledDesc: Phases will advance automatically when all results are in
autoAdvance.disabledDesc: You will need to advance phases manually using the buttons below

approval.title: Join Request Approval
approval.description: When enabled, players who try to join will need to wait for host or co-admin approval.
approval.requiredDesc: Players will need your approval to join
approval.directDesc: Players can join directly with the invite code

extraTime.title: Result Measurement
extraTime.description: Choose whether picks are scored against the 90-minute result or including extra time. Penalties are never counted.
extraTime.lockedDeadline: Locked — less than 48h until first match

pendingRequests.title: Pending Requests ({count})
pendingRequests.description: The following users have requested to join the pool and are waiting for your approval.

members.title: Member Management
members.description: You can promote players to Co-Admins to help you manage results and create invitations.
members.promoteConfirm:
Promote {name} to Co-Admin?

Co-Admins can:
• Publish and correct results
• Create invite codes
• View the admin panel
members.demoteConfirm:
Demote {name} to regular player?

They will lose Co-Admin permissions.

archive.title: Archive Pool
archive.description: The tournament has ended. You can archive this pool to move it out of the main view. Archived pools remain accessible but are marked as historical.
archive.confirm:
Are you sure you want to archive this pool?

This will mark the pool as archived. Members will still be able to view the leaderboard and final results, but no further changes will be allowed.

hostInfo.title: Host Information
hostInfo.tip1: Phases advance automatically when all matches have results (if auto-advance is enabled)
hostInfo.tip2: If we detect a recent errata (last 24h), auto-advance will be blocked and you'll need to advance manually
hostInfo.tip3: You can use the "Advance Phase" button to force manual advancement when needed
hostInfo.tip4: Use the "Lock" button to prevent auto-advances and allow corrections on a completed phase
hostInfo.tip5: Locked phases will allow modifying results even after advancing to the next phase
hostInfo.tip6: The system will apply tiebreaker criteria automatically (points, goal difference, head-to-head)

pendingPhase.title: Pending Phase - Teams To Be Determined
pendingPhase.description: The teams in this phase will be determined automatically when the matches in the previous phase are completed. For now, you can see the scheduled matches with placeholders (e.g.: "Winner Group A", "Best 3rd").

matchCard.pendingDesc: This match will be enabled when the participating teams are determined.

result.title: Result
result.correctionRequired: To correct a result, you must provide a reason

matchPicks.title: Picks
matchPicks.notUnlocked: The deadline has not passed yet. You can only see your own pick.

expulsion.kickWarning: Simple kick: The player will be removed from the pool but will be able to request access again later using an invite code.
expulsion.kickReasonPlaceholder: E.g.: Requested to leave the pool
expulsion.kickSuccess: {name} has been kicked from the pool
expulsion.banWarning: WARNING: This action is PERMANENT and IRREVERSIBLE
expulsion.banDetail1: The player will NOT be able to rejoin this pool ever again
expulsion.banDetail2: Optionally you can delete all their picks
expulsion.banDetail3: This action is recorded in the audit log
expulsion.banReasonPlaceholder: E.g.: Inappropriate behavior, cheating, offensive language, etc.
expulsion.banReasonRequired: You must provide a reason for the ban
expulsion.deletePicks: Delete all their picks (will affect the leaderboard)

scoring.title: Scoring System
scoring.defaultDesc: Classic scoring system for sports pools
scoring.exactScore: points for getting the exact score right
scoring.outcomeOnly: points for getting only the result right (winner or draw)

pickTypes.title: Pick Types
pickTypes.scoreDesc: You must predict the exact score of the match (e.g.: 2-1). If you get the exact score right, you earn more points.
pickTypes.outcomeDesc: You only need to predict the match result (Home Win, Draw, Away Win).

deadline.title: Deadline Policy
deadline.description: You can make and modify your picks up to {minutes} minutes before the start of each match. Once the deadline is reached, the match becomes LOCKED and you won't be able to edit your pick.
deadline.important: Important: Make sure to check the dates and times of the matches. All times are shown in the time zone: {timezone}

notifications.urgentPicks: You have {count} match without a pick closing in the next few hours ({details}).
notifications.urgentPicksPlural: You have {count} matches without picks closing in the next few hours ({details}).
notifications.pendingResults: {count} played match without a published result.

configNoRules: No scoring configuration available for this pool.
rulesSubheader: This pool has custom configuration per phase. Read each phase carefully to understand how to earn points.

pickTypeDescriptions.PARTIAL_SCORE: Get at least one of the scores right (e.g.: 2-? or ?-1)
pickTypeDescriptions.TOTAL_GOALS: Get the total number of goals in the match right (e.g.: 3 goals)
pickTypeDescriptions.HOME_GOALS: Get the home team's goals right
pickTypeDescriptions.AWAY_GOALS: Get the away team's goals right
pickTypeDescriptions.MATCH_OUTCOME_90MIN: Get who wins or if they draw right

rulesDisplay.ptsPerExactPosition: {points} pts for each team in its exact position
rulesDisplay.bonusPerfectGroupPts: +{points} pts bonus for getting a whole group right
rulesDisplay.globalQualifiersAdditional: Additional prediction of global qualifiers ({points} pts/position)
rulesDisplay.predictTotalQualifiers: Predict the order of the {total} qualifying teams
rulesDisplay.lockDateWarning: This prediction will be locked on: {date}
rulesDisplay.knockoutWinnerPoints: {points} pts for each team you correctly predict to advance to the next round
rulesDisplay.knockoutWinnerNote: (The score or how they advance doesn't matter, only who goes through)
rulesDisplay.notePhaseRules: Each tournament phase can have different pick types and scoring.
rulesDisplay.noteReadCarefully: Read the rules of EACH PHASE carefully before making your predictions.
rulesDisplay.notePointsIncrease: Points usually increase in later tournament phases (round of 16, quarter-finals, semi-finals, final).
rulesDisplay.cumulativeSystem: Cumulative system: Points ADD UP for each criterion you get right. If you get the exact score, you earn the sum of all criteria (max 10 pts in groups, 20 pts in knockouts).
rulesDisplay.nonCumulativeNote: If you get the exact score, you also automatically match other types (but you only earn points for the exact score).
rulesDisplay.deadlineNote: Picks are locked based on the deadline configured for this pool: {minutes} minutes before each match starts.

scoringBreakdown.ptsPerCorrectAdvance: {points} pts for each team that advances correctly

structuralManager.hostGroupDesc: Order the teams from 1st to 4th place in each group
structuralManager.hostKnockoutDesc: Publish the result of each match (players predict who advances)
structuralManager.playerKnockoutDesc: Select which team advances in each match
structuralManager.hostLockedMessage: All official results have been published
structuralManager.playerLockedMessage: Phase locked - Official results have already been published
structuralManager.orderAtLeastOneGroup: You must order at least one group before saving
structuralManager.selectAtLeastOneWinner: You must select at least one winner before saving

playerSummaryView.onlyDeadlinePassed: Only picks for matches whose deadline has passed are shown.

phaseConfig.withScoresDesc: Players predict the exact result of each match.
phaseConfig.withoutScoresDesc: Players predict final positions or who advances.
phaseConfig.pickTypesDesc: Enable the pick types you want to allow.
phaseConfig.pickTypesDescFull: Enable the pick types you want to allow. You can have several active simultaneously.
phaseConfig.orderPositionsDescFull: Players order the teams from 1st to 4th place in each group. Configure how many points each correct position is worth.
phaseConfig.bonusPerfectGroup: Bonus for getting the complete group right
phaseConfig.exampleGroup: If a player gets all 4 positions in a group right, they earn {p1} + {p2} + {p3} + {p4} = {total} pts.
phaseConfig.exampleGroupBonus: They also receive +{bonus} pts bonus, for a total of {grandTotal} pts per perfect group.
phaseConfig.predictWhoAdvancesDesc: Players select which team advances to the next round in each match. It doesn't matter the score or how they advance (regular time, extra time or penalties).
phaseConfig.exampleAdvance: In Round of 32 there are 16 matches. If you get 10 of 16 right, you earn {points} pts.

EXACT_SCORE.title: Exact Score
EXACT_SCORE.description: The player must get the full score right. It's the hardest and most valuable pick. If you get the exact score, you also get the goal difference, partial score and total goals right (but you only earn the exact score points, which is the highest).
EXACT_SCORE.example: Example with 20 pts: You predict 2-1, result is 2-1 -> WIN 20 PTS | Result 3-1 -> 0 pts | Result 2-0 -> 0 pts

GOAL_DIFFERENCE.title: Goal Difference
GOAL_DIFFERENCE.description: Get the exact difference between home and away goals right, even if the score isn't exact. You only earn these points if you did NOT get the exact score.
GOAL_DIFFERENCE.example: Example with 10 pts: You predict 2-0 (+2), result is 3-1 (+2) -> WIN 10 PTS | Result 2-1 (+1) -> 0 pts | Result 2-0 -> WIN 20 PTS for exact

PARTIAL_SCORE.title: Partial Score
PARTIAL_SCORE.description: Get ONLY the goals of ONE team (home OR away) right, but NOT both at once. If you get both right, that counts as exact score (worth more points). This type is useful when you partially get it right.
PARTIAL_SCORE.example: Example with 8 pts: You predict 2-1, result is 2-3 -> WIN 8 PTS (the 2 from home) | Result 3-3 -> 0 pts | Result 2-1 -> WIN 20 PTS for exact

TOTAL_GOALS.title: Total Goals
TOTAL_GOALS.description: Get the total number of goals in the match (home + away), regardless of who scored them or the final result. You only earn these points if you did NOT get exact score, goal difference, or partial score.
TOTAL_GOALS.shortDesc: Get the sum of goals right (e.g.: 3 goals).
TOTAL_GOALS.example: Example with 5 pts: You predict 2-1 (3 goals), result is 3-0 (3 goals) -> WIN 5 PTS | Result 2-0 (2 goals) -> 0 pts | Result 2-1 -> WIN 20 PTS for exact

MATCH_OUTCOME_90MIN.title: Result 90min
MATCH_OUTCOME_90MIN.description: Predict only the winner or draw in regular time (Home Win, Draw, Away Win). Not available when scores are required.
MATCH_OUTCOME_90MIN.example: Only for no-score picks. Not combinable with goal predictions.

HOME_GOALS.title: Home Goals
HOME_GOALS.description: Get only the goals scored by the home team right.
HOME_GOALS.example: Example with 4 pts: You predict 2-?, result is 2-3 -> WIN 4 PTS | Result 3-0 -> 0 pts

AWAY_GOALS.title: Away Goals
AWAY_GOALS.description: Get only the goals scored by the away team right.
AWAY_GOALS.example: Example with 4 pts: You predict ?-1, result is 2-1 -> WIN 4 PTS | Result 2-2 -> 0 pts
